title: How to Speak Powerfully So People Listen, with Julian Treasure
description:
We are all so hungry to be heard and feel known, yet for so many of us we are left feeling like no one is actually listening. This week, special guest, top rated international speaker and communications expert Julian Treasure shares his best kept secrets behind how to speak powerfully so people pay attention. Plus, Jillian shares her most recent travel debacle in too famous to have fun!

Guest Links:

Website: https://www.juliantreasure.com

Julian’s course, How to Speak So That People Listen: https://www.juliantreasure.com/courses/speak-listen-be


Start your FREE 7 day trial for Jillian’s App at https://go.jillianmichaels.com/WNt1rL7uyZ

Send us your brief question at jillianpodcast@gmail.com

Follow us on Instagram @JillianMichaels and @MartiniCindy


This Week’s Sponsors:

SKILLSHARE.com/JILLIAN, for a free trial of Premium Membership to the 1st 1,000 people

THERAGUN.com/JILLIAN, starting at $199

JILLIANNUCALM.com for 50% off your 30-day subscription
